title: Darkstream: Bigger and badder
author: VD
content_html: Comicsgater Ethan van Sciver is pretty confident that he’s still going to be a bigger deal in comics than I am in six months. As I discuss in the Darkstream, we’ll just have to see about that….
content_text:
